description: There is no need to sacrifice comfort or style for function. The Vagabond will take you from the street to the trail and back again. Made from a durable stretch fabric with details like stealth stow pockets, underarm ventilation and reinforced articulated elbows, the Vagabond is easily matched with both a pair of our Riff Jeans for work, or our Pinner shorts for the trails.
name: Sombrio Vagabond Riding Shirt - Mens
